articles.title: "Let's Finish This Job": Biden Makes 2024 Presidential Run Official - NDTV
articles.description: President Joe Biden said on Tuesday he will seek a second White House term in 2024, a decision that will test whether Americans are ready to give the 80-year-old Democrat, already the oldest USpresident ever, another four years in office.
articles.content:
Joe Biden is the oldest US President ever.

articles.title: College Board to revise AP African American studies course again - The Washington Post
articles.description: The College Board announced Monday that it will again revise its much-criticized plan for a new Advanced Placement course in African American studies.
articles.content:

articles.title: Len Goodman, stalwart judge on 'Dancing With the Stars,' dies at 78 - The Washington Post
articles.description: The British ballroom dancer became known to millions of American television viewers for his cockney-inflected one-liners.
